name: AVAssetResourceLoader
desc: An object that mediates resource requests from a URL asset.

items.name: func setDelegate(AVAssetResourceLoaderDelegate?, queue: DispatchQueue?)
items.desc: Sets the delegate and dispatch queue to use with the resource loader.

items.name: var delegate: AVAssetResourceLoaderDelegate?
items.desc: The delegate object to use when handling resource requests.

items.name: protocol AVAssetResourceLoaderDelegate
items.desc: Methods you can implement to handle resource-loading requests coming from a URL asset.

items.name: var delegateQueue: DispatchQueue?
items.desc: The dispatch queue to use when handling resource requests.

items.name: var preloadsEligibleContentKeys: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether content keys will be loaded as quickly as possible.
